prompt.content: What are the items that McAfee (MFE) removes from GAAP Net Income in calculating Non-GAAP Net Income for the year 2009? What is the dollar impact of each of these? Express the answer in $M rounded to 2 decimal places of precision

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Stock-based compensation expense +$109.09M","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Amortization of purchased technology +$77.96M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Amortization of intangibles +$40.72M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Acquisition-related costs +$34.45M"},{"criteria":"Restructuring costs +$13.83M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"litigation related costs +$5.53M"},{"criteria":"loss on sale of assets +$0.474M","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Total impact is 282.05M","operator":"correctness"}]
